node.statement: STRATEGY A2: BILINEARITY COLLAPSE COMPARISON. The 3-term representation collapses to 2-term independent: (v₁+αv₃)⊗w₁+(v₂+βv₃)⊗w₂. The independent case gives ‖v₁+αv₃‖‖w₁‖+‖v₂+βv₃‖‖w₂‖ ≥ 1 (PROVED). Question: does ‖v₁‖‖w₁‖+‖v₂‖‖w₂‖+‖v₃‖‖w₃‖ ≥ ‖v₁+αv₃‖‖w₁‖+‖v₂+βv₃‖‖w₂‖ always hold? If yes, CP follows immediately.
